overview:
Andrew Martin is the founder & CEO of Rzolve LLC, the company that developed of VoteRec.

Prior to that, Andrew founded Caucus Media LLC, a political consulting and advertising firm and taught on the adjunct political science faculty at Susquehanna University in Pennsylvania.

He holds a BA from Haverford College and a JD from the University of Wisconsin Law School, where he also spent a year as a visiting student at the Georgetown University Law Center.
